aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: Who I am, what I do, and why I enjoy coding so much
aboutMe.headline: Fullstack Developer and Programming Student

items.content: I'm Ignacio Figueroa, I study Programming at UTN and I also learn a lot on my own. I'm really interested in Fullstack Development and understanding how an application is built from scratch. I enjoy working with modern technologies and seeing what I can create with them. I also care about using good architectures, thinking through the structure of projects, and applying OOP to keep everything organized and scalable. For me, programming is a challenge where there's always something new to figure out.

I usually build personal projects, from small components to full applications. Each project is an excuse to experiment and try new ideas. My strongest area is the Frontend because of the design and interaction, but I also enjoy working on the Backend, building APIs and understanding how all the pieces connect.

Lately, I've been diving deeper into integrating Artificial Intelligence into modern applications, aiming to add smarter features and automate tasks that used to take more time. What drives me is the idea of continuously improving what I do, discovering new tools, and finding solutions that actually work. Every project is a way to grow and show what I'm learning.
